title: Football Analytics Web App
description: A Flask-based app that shows top scorers and stats across European leagues. Built with Bootstrap, hosted on Ubuntu with Nginx.

title: Investment Tracker
description: A minimalist stock tracking app using Yahoo Finance data. Includes sparkline charts and portfolio breakdowns.

title: JAM Construction Estimator
description: Estimating pipeline and business for a Black woman-owned startup construction company.

title: Study Buddy Web App
description: AI powered web app that can summarize transcripts and provide study notes as well as generate flashcards.
